title: Nylon Noose 1963 (Mystery, Crime film) directed by Rudolf Zehetgruber

sources.title: Nylon Noose 1963 (Mystery, Crime film) directed by Rudolf Zehetgruber
sources.description:
Unravel the mystery and escape the knots of fate!
In the eerie confines of a mansion, stockholders convene for a company meeting, unaware of the sinister experiments being conducted by a mad doctor within its walls. As the gathering unfolds, a chilling mystery unravels, with lifeless bodies emerging, each marked by the distinct and gruesome signature of death by nylon noose strangulation.

Original Title: Die Nylonschlinge (1963)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/iNLCI74gzRk

Director: Rudolf Zehetgruber
Writers:  Fred Ignor, Thomas Engel
Stars: Richard Goodman, Helga Sommerfeld, Laya Raki
Genres: Colorized classics, Crime, Drama, Mystery

00:00 Full Movie
04:54  Inspector Powers is investigating a murder at a bar and suspects a customer who was blackmailed.
13:39  Inspector Harvey from Scotland Yard questions Sir David about a murder at Elford Manor.

24:03  A police inspector investigates a murder at a nightclub and suspects the involvement of a dancer and the owner of Elford Manor.
31:57  Inspector investigates the murders at Elford Manor and suspects Henry, a servant.
37:50  Inspector Harvey investigates a murder and encounters suspicious characters.
50:45  A mysterious conversation reveals plans for revenge, a marriage for money, and the sale of diamonds.
53:12  A detective investigates a series of murders and uncovers a plot involving stolen diamonds.
1:04:01  A murder mystery unfolds as Jane confronts Mr. Harrison about the killing of her parents and his plans to silence her.
